Package ch.qos.logback.classic.sift

Class Summary
AppenderFactory  
ContextBasedDiscriminator This discriminator returns the value context to which this event is attached to.
MDCBasedDiscriminator MDCBasedDiscriminator essentially returns the value mapped to an MDC key.
SiftAction  
SiftingAppender This appender can contains other appenders which it can build dynamically depending on MDC values.
